name: Dr. Ken Walibora
bio: Dr. Ken Walibora founded Best Dental with a vision to bring world-class cosmetic dentistry to Juja. With over 10 years of experience and advanced training in aesthetic procedures, he combines precision technique with genuine patient care.

name: Dental Assistant
bio: Our skilled dental assistant ensures every patient receives thorough preventive care. Her gentle approach makes even nervous patients feel at ease during cleanings and checkups.
